member.name: F:Enterprise.Sqlite.Constants.ConnectionStrings.InMemory
member.summary: This connection string creates a truly temporary database for the duration of a single connection, without sharing capability between different connections.

member.name: F:Enterprise.Sqlite.Constants.ConnectionStrings.InMemoryFile
member.summary: This connection string creates a temporary in-memory database that can be shared across multiple connections. This makes it more suitable for scenarios where data sharing between connections is required.
